column2: but we got it for free!): After telling our waiter that it was our first time (as if they didn't know...with all the squealing over the adorable menus and taking 30000 photos of everything)
column3: they sent this dish out as a "welcome to Uchi" gift!  Might have been partially because it was free
column4: but holy crap these were the best sprouts I've EVER HAD!!!  I love sweet foods that aren't dessert - these were perfectly roasted and doused in a very sticky sweet soy sauce flavor. Recommended even if you have to pay for them!
